data.name: If The Dream Of Star
data.detailed_description:
IIf The Dream Of Star is an Asian music tour that I began to prepare to make in March 2021.

The main way to play the game is to dodge and attack with notes, and there are also barrage that appears with rhythm to avoid.
Every score and map are fixed, so make good use of every note to pick up props and weapons.

At the end of the 21st century, with the rapid development of science and technology, human beings who migrated to β-455 planet lived under great pressure every day. Scientists have invented a brain connector, called Munro Star, which connects with the virtual world created by scientists. In this virtual world, people are very happy. The beautiful scene of the virtual world leads many people to be unwilling to return to the real world, resulting in negative economic growth in the real world. What's more, the body is dead, but the consciousness still stays in the virtual world.

But in fact, is this really the case?

Game flow: 1-2 hours

[operating method]
WASD moves
I confirm/investigate
Esc cancel/open menu
Alt+Enter full screen switch

data.short_description: "If The Dream Of Star" is an Asian-language tour attacking and dodging with music, which is a game centered around "psychology". This is a virtual world, where people are carefree but completely happy. Is it really happy?
